channel.title: Jack Approves on The Big Ugly House Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jack Approves on The Big Ugly House Blog

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Chapter 12
item.description: The bear was his only friend now. Plot Summary Chapter 12 opens with Norm Cotten’s suggestion that Jack take some time off to be with his wife. This makes Jack furious, naturally. While Jack is away on unspecified business, Starlight breaks into the house and kills Dorothy. Jack approves. A bear’s gotta do what a bear’s gotta do. Jack cries, but “not the tears of grief, but of the same old hatred and rage.
